sentences.translation: He has a lot of strength.

sentences.simplifiedText: 尽管他面临重大挑战，但他仍然集中全部力气去克服。
sentences.traditionalText: 儘管他面臨重大挑戰，但他仍然集中全部力氣去克服。
sentences.pinyin: Jǐnguǎn tā miàn lín zhòngdà tiǎozhàn, dàn tā réngrán jízhōng quánbù lìqì qù kèfú.
sentences.translation: Despite facing major challenges, he still gathers all his strength to overcome them.
